results.title: Pirates of Spring Cove
results.creator_credit: Richard Thorpe, Alan Brown and Duota Rentals
results.brief_description: Hayley Mills and John Mills star in this family pleaser that has adventure, piracy, buried treasure and romance. An American widower and his 18 year old daughter live on a Caribbean houseboat. When they invite the nephew of a millionaire to join them on their voyage, romance and action hop on board too. The nephew’s former business partner arrives and together they embark on a dive to discover buried treasure. James MacArthur (Hawaii Five-O) co stars. Also known as “The Truth about Spring”, after Hayley Mills’ character, Spring Tyler.

results.title: Pins and needles
results.creator_credit: Barbara A. Chobocky, Kim Batterham, Genni Batterham and Documentary Films
results.brief_description: An account of the emotional struggle of a 24 year old woman, Genni Batterham, who contracts Multiple Sclerosis and becomes a paraplegic in less than 18 months. The film examines the attitude and reactions of her parents, husband and society.

results.title: Pinocchio (Disney)
results.creator_credit: Hamilton Luske, Ben Sharpsteen, Walt Disney, RKO Radio Pictures and Walt Disney Pictures
results.brief_description: This inspiring tale about the magical powers of believing in your dreams is a timeless fantasy that has delighted generations. Winner of two Academy Awards for Best Score and Song, Jiminy Cricket’s “When you wish upon a star.” While kindy toymaker Gepetto sleeps, a blue fairy brings his beloved marionette Pinocchio to life. With the help of his wise friend Jiminy Cricket, Pinocchio begins a voyage that will test his loyalty, bravery and honesty- virtues he must learn to become a real boy. Features the voices of Mel Blanc, Don Brodie, Walter Catlett, Cliff Edwards and others.

results.title: The Vale of Kashmir
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Journey into the Himalayas”.
The Vale of Kashmir has been the destination of tourists for centuries. Kashmir is renowned throughout the world for its exquisite crafts and exotic houseboats lining the shores of picturesque Dal Lake. Keith Adam looks behind the tourist facade to find the lifestyle of the real Kashmiri.

results.title: Pink narcissus
results.brief_description: In this imaginatively erotic surrealist film a young man (Bobby Kendall) escapes the confines of the real world through the personas of a slave, bullfighter, wood nymph and harem boy; all shot in a glorious sequence of pink hued fantasies. One of the most infamous gay films produced, it played to a sold out crowd at the 1984 New York Gay Film Festival. Shot on 8mm by Anonymous (James Bidgood has been credited as director since 1984), the final edit of this video was completed by Martin Jay Sadoff who included the musical track and sound effects.
